actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to authorize the President to provide international disaster assistance for the construction or reconstruction of permanent single family housing for those who are homeless as a result of the effects of the earthquake in El Salvador on January 13, 2001.
short_title: El Salvador Homebuilding Relief Act of 2001

summary.text: El Salvador Homebuilding Relief Act of 2001 - Authorizes the President to provide international disaster assistance for the construction and reconstruction of permanent single family housing for those who are homeless as a result of the earthquake in El Salvador on January 13, 2001.

titles.title: El Salvador Homebuilding Relief Act of 2001

A bill to authorize the President to provide international disaster assistance for the construction or reconstruction of permanent single family housing for those who are homeless as a result of the effects of the earthquake in El Salvador on January 13, 2001.
